summary: Software engineer with 15+ years of experience in enterprise application development. Experience in running applications on-premises, hybrid or native in AWS.

projects.brief: As a developer at ING Bank, I'm responsible for modernizing core banking, payments, and broker platforms using the latest technology...
projects.achievements: During the Discovery Phase, ING Bank successfully conducted extensive market research, pinpointed specific operational needs, fostered alignment among stakeholders, assessed advanced technology options, and established a robust regulatory compliance framework.

projects.brief: As a developer, I'll integrate NPP payments with MPS, enabling customizable subscription agreements...
projects.achievements: Improved business's customer management system, providing a centralized platform to manage customer information and payments. This project streamlines the payment process, improves the customer experience.

projects.designation: Tech Lead - Software Developer - via Recruitment Company
projects.brief: As a developer on this project, I collaborate to enhance on-time performance in the NSW Transport network...
projects.achievements: The project reduced transportation delays with data analytics, improved scheduling and infrastructure, and ensured reliability through stakeholder collaboration and monitoring.

projects.designation: Tech Lead - Software Developer via Infosys/ Recruitment Company
projects.brief: As a developer on this project, I'll focus on building a loan generation platform for Westpac, a leading Australian bank...
projects.achievements: Developed Westpac's loan platform with digital application, credit assessment, and loan management tools, enhancing customer experience and streamlining loan approvals

projects.brief: As a developer on this project, I aim to develop a mortgage broker platform for Mortgage Choice, a leading Australian mortgage broker...
projects.achievements: Developed Mortgage Choice's loan platform with digital application, credit assessment, and loan management tools, enhancing customer experience and streamlining loan approvals

projects.brief: Developing an inventory management platform for Electroboard, an Australian AV system provider...
projects.achievements: Implemented inventory management platform for Electroboard, centralizing inventory management, track stock levels, and generate purchase orders.

projects.client: Roche Diagnostics International A.G, Switzerland as part of Accenture Services Ltd.
projects.brief: Implementing Cobas 4800, 6800 systems and P480 Pooler at Roche Diagnostics to enhance diagnostic capabilities...
projects.achievements: Implemented Cobas 4800, 6800 systems and P480 Pooler at Roche Diagnostics to enhance diagnostic capabilities, providing faster, precise diagnoses.
responsibilities: Design, development, and testing of software applications.
Writing high-quality, maintainable, and testable code in C#.
Utilizing WCF and REST to develop scalable and secure web services.
Building rich user interfaces using WPF and Silverlight.
Implementing web applications using ASP.NET MVC 5 and ASP.NET WEB API.
Implementing unit tests using UNITY, N-Unit, and MOQ.
Using TFS for source control and continuous integration.
Utilizing Entity Framework for ORM solutions.
Utilizing NServiceBus for messaging and communication between components.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams, such as designers and QA engineers, to ensure the delivery of high-quality software.
Keeping up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends.
